div.bibl: Lietuva, Mar. 12, 1911. THE FIRST GRAND LITHUANIAN CONCERT(Summary)

body.p: The Lithuanian Band of Chicago is giving its first concert, May 14, at St. George's Parish Hall, 33rd Place and Auburn Avenue. It begins at 4: P.M.

The band will play the finest music that has been composed. The concert's director is Mr. J. Yakaitis, who is a graduate of the Cracow Conservatory of Music, and also has obtained a medal for his musical accomplishments.
